name: DONNA Calhoun
text: Great local bookstore. The owner is amazingly knowledgeable

resp.text: Thanks Donna. Always nice to chat with you when you come in the shop. ❤️📚

name: Cameron Hornsby
text: my sister and i stopped in today and bought tons of books at AMAZING prices! what a great place to shop and you’re supporting a local business! the owner was very nice and welcoming as well. we had the best time browsing and it was very hard to leave. i definitely recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your support ❤️📚

name: Kristen Crowder
text: What a great find!!  Came in searching for one particular book and walked out with a bunch of other treasures.  Took my 8yo with me and she loved it also.  We aren’t from Mobile but If you are ever in the area, I highly recommend stopping by this store.  You won’t be disappointed.  They even have story time for kids ( I think weekly).

resp.text: Thanks Kristen!! It was great to meet you. Look forward to seeing you next time you’re in town.

name: Wyatt
text: Very friendly and knowledgeable owner! Highly recommend. Good to know that you can trade books in for credit as well!

resp.text: Thanks Wyatt!!! See you again soon

name: John Archer
text: Great selections, great prices. They always have something I’m looking for. Stephen (owner) is super kind, knowledgeable about book topics, and we always have great conversations. This is one of my favorite places in Daphne.

resp.text: Thanks John. See you again soon

name: Traci Webster
text: Love this place!! We stopped in there for the first time yesterday and were greeted by the owner, Stephen. He showed us around and pointed us in the direction of our book interests. We left with a handful of books. Reminds me of 2nd and Charles...Great prices! Go support local!

resp.text: Traci, thank you for visiting us and for your kind words.

name: Penny Dupre
text: Organized store, pleasant and friendly staff. And great prices!

resp.text: Thank you Penny!! It’s was great to meet you and your family today.

name: Thomas Fearing
text: Knowledgeable bookseller. Surprisingly wide selection for a small bookstrore. We picked up 5 books - both new and gently used!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Thomas. It was nice to meet you and your partner today.

name: Daniel Thompson
text: Over 2000 titles new and used. Great history section! New kids books. A wonderful addition to our neighborhood.

resp.text: Thanks for stopping by Daniel. Look forward to seeing you again.

name: Mary Ann Nichols
text: Owner very knowledgeable and personable. A MUST VISIT PLACE

resp.text: Thank you Mary Ann. Very appreciated ❤️📚

name: Richard “Goodtimes” Caudell
text: Airsoft paintball laser tag.  17 acres of battle fields. Some rental gear. Friendly staff.

resp.text: That does sound like a cool bookstore, unfortunately we don’t have paintball here. 😂❤️📚

name: Cathy Chandler
text: There is such a variety of merchandise. Jeff is a pleasure to do business with. It has to be the best kept secret in Gadsden. You need to go by there to look for new, used, antique, unusual, jewelry, daycare products toys and more!!! I love that place. Located in the old Sticks and Stuff building across the interstate from Gadsden City High School.

name: Justin Guyton
text: Great place to take your time & enjoy looking at everything.  The two guys were helpfull & friendly. Surprised how stress free the enivorment was with the vendors being so postive Ive become a regular Im in there several times a week & glad to see how much they have added to the place.

name: Gary Johnson
text: This place sells nothing but junk and stuff that don't work...... And then they wanna say all sells at final... That's bad business and a rip off.....i strongly offer everyone not to buy anything from them.......

name: John Walker
text: Some good stuff but lots of junk too

name: Brian Rodgers
text: Lots of interesting unique vintage items.

name: Paula Stewart
text: Going out of business

name: Sherry Rylander
text: Closed.

name: Dakota Gray
text: Love this place! Have traded books here over the past 8 or so years. I hate they are getting ready to close. Run by if you get a chance before they close their doors for good!

name: Beth T
text: Used book store. Found the books I wanted. Good selection. Reasonable prices.

name: Charlie and little bit
text:
Update: Went to take some books in that were given to me that I don't read and the lady that was there said they were too old, yet they had the same series on the shelves. She didn't bother really looking at them other than to keep one she wanted out of about 40 and we still bought a few books that day. Really disappointed, the sign doesn't say if the books are too old they won't take them, just trade 2 for 1. Hadn't had the desire to go back. Luckily, someone at Sonic wanted them and gave them to her.
Yes they have good books at really decent prices for used, paperbacks.

name: Jacque Kunze
text: I love the Book Rack!! They have a tremendous variety of books/genre's. The Ladies working there are very kind and helpful!!

name: Gwen H
text: Love this place. Found Books for me and my 10 year old. Get more for your money.

name: Aaron Bell
text: It's a great small place with workers that makes you feel good for shopping there

name: Tonna Saunders
text: They sell used books for half or the publisher's price. The selection is very good , and the staff is friendly and super helpful.

name: Seth Sweezer
text: Love this place  a lot of used book new books comes in daily.

name: Tracy Gaines
text: Awesome

name: Lila Wild
text: Great little book store. Packed with lots of historical things!

name: Avery Whitecotton
text: Bookstores are dying all across the country. I like to support locally-owned businesses like Recollected Books. Neat place with an excellent selection of books.

name: Cloey Robertson
text: The owner is always incredibly nice and helpful. I could spend hours in here just looking through all the books. You never know what you might find.

name: Andrew Brooks
text: Nice old retired professor running a used book store; the entire store is almost packed solid with books two above where you can reach anymore book said you would not be able to walk through the store also has a lot of very nice little curios from his past life scattered about

name: Macius Darkwood
text: Always go there. John is an inspiring man

name: Zedd is dead
text: My favorite place ever

name: Tim Elam
text: A charming little bookstore with an interesting price structure. Books are half off the cover price plus 25¢. You can trade it in for a credit toward your next purchase. Selections range across all genres and most books are arranged in alphabetical order by author. If you like paperback mysteries, then this place is for you. From the classics to today's best sellers, you'll find plenty to read here.

name: Kassondra Baylis
text: I got so many books. Too bad today is the last day before they close..... thanks for the memories and books. God bless

resp.text: Kassondra thank you. It has been the pleasure of my Mother’s life and she would have been so proud that so many will enjoy them.

name: Robin Featherston
text: Nice little bookstore with a LOT of books! Staff is so nice too.

name: D Zonneveld
text: Wonderful store to find previously read books.

name: Jordan Edgerly
text: Friendly staff and a great selection of books

name: Astro Colter
text: Wonderful place with fair prices, very sad its going out of business

name: Kaitilyn Jacobs
text: The cutest little book store .

name: Josh Bills
text: May 11, 2019 ....Super sad its closing today

resp.text: We are sad too. My mom worked so hard to build that.  It we are so happy that so many got to have it.

name: Timothy Landers
text: The books taste 👌👌👌👌👌

name: Greg Phillips
text: My dad got me an old submarine manual from this bookstore.   They shipped it the same day he ordered it and it arrived packed VERY GOOD in bubble-wrap so no chance of damage in the mail.  Fast shipping, excellent packing, and the exact book I needed!  A great transaction like this means that I will definitely be putting Gibson 's Books on my short list of links to check every time I need to order a book.

resp.text: Glad it arrived safe and sound.  Enjoy it

name: Mandy McKenzie
text: Unbelievable antique books

resp.text: Thank You

name: Lucy Mirando
text: GREAT Selection and knowledgeable helpful staff! I wound up buying far more than I had intended. Not a bad thing!

name: Patty Bohart
text: Friendly owners.  Great collection.

name: Chic Lady
text: Love this place and wish we had more places like this in the area! Books are so very important! Let’s keep them in business!!

name: Samantha Stanley
text: Great little bookstore. They have new and used titles, and Mike can order books if they don't have them in the store. Super friendly and great prices.

name: The Mr. Franklin
text: Great book selection

name: AGY'MAH MR. SWEET CORN (DA-DA)
text: I buy soap, and outfix

name: Mary Mack
text: Great experience... amazing collection of books...felt like a kid in a candy store... loved the African style fashions in the adjoining store...it initially got my attention.

name: Artemas Holloway
text: Get vintage and hard to find tangible books.

name: Mark Hainds
text: With so few independent bookstores out there cherish those still standing, like Read Herring!

name: Richard Bunce
text: Montgomery's pride and joy.

name: Julia Baumhoff
text: Good selection of books.

name: Evelyn Roberts
text: I purchased 2 books there

name: Donna Russell
text: Love this place!!!

name: Anthony Bonetti
text: Great place to shop.  Every time I go in there, the staff is always helpful and friendly.  Never had a bad experience at FOS.  Dan will go out of his way to get me what I need, and always makes me a good deal so we both walk away happy.  Ronnie is always friendly and helpful, and I thoroughly enjoy talking/complaining about the latest storylines with him.  They even help my wife buy me gifts for holidays so she knows she is getting me what I will like 😀.  Great selection, knowledgable and friendly staff, can't recommend FOS Comics enough!

name: Man vs. Rock
text: Awesome spot! Got to get them comics son! Like my personal favorite: Indie Comic of the Year - Man Vs. Rock!!!

name: lava cannon
text: The workers are extremely nice and I really enjoyed the set up of the store. I intend to go back frequently.

name: Tessa Rose
text: Great shop! Wonderful selection and staff

name: Veldel
text: Great staff and very welcoming.

name: Batmatt Thunder
text: Your not a customer your a friend.

name: Marshall Johnson
text: Lots of selection and cheap.

name: Kea Theroux, LMSW (OreoRocks)
text:
More of a gaming store, from the outside you can't even tell they have comics. This isn't even the name listed on the building.

Free comic book day --- huge disappointment. No celebration of what they are supposed to sell.

name: Aaron the Nomad
text: Blank is simply a cozy coffee shop that has great vibes. It is the perfect place to get a Quick coffee or just sit and do some reading. The environment is calm, peaceful, and always has some classic tunes playing.

name: Spencer Williams
text: Loved it! I was visiting from out of town and needed a place to chill. The two staff I met were super friendly and cool, they let us play board games while we hung out. Food options are limited to muffins, but they have a decent drink selection. Small comic and record selection, but a really awesome place.

resp.text: Out of towners are our favorites. You guys get it! We get you, too.

name: Andrea Lindholm
text: Keishun is wonderful and makes an excellent cup of coffee! Love it.

name: Jay B
text: Interesting collection of things being sold in the shop. Nice little place. I think a weekly group was there playing d&d at the only table in the shop. We ordered our drinks and left.

name: Chris West
text: I love the shop. Totally cool retro look. Love the patio area out back. The guys that run the store are great to talk to and know what they are talking about when it comes to comics and anything else they sell. They are super nice guys.

name: Timothy Green
text:
Came in for a coffee. Server who was going to prepare my drink wiped his nose audibly across his open palm while waiting at the register for my order. Gross. Hard pass.

Update: Check out the Owner's response to this review. Just lovely. I never ordered btw, just excused myself politely and left. Find coffee elsewhere mates! Ye be warned.

resp.text: I prefer to give people an OPPORTUNITY to wash their hands before PREPARING my beverage. Otherwise my daily triggering isn't as fair as the safe place Im constantly demanding.  Those computer screens, along with cash and cards are much grosser that you'd think. Washing hands before TAKING the order just creates the need to wash them again. We wash hands 100% of the time before making ANY beverages. ALWAYS HAVE AND ALWAYS WILL. But yeah, that's gross, and probably embarrassing to the guy attempting to take your order. Downright deplorable. You know that feeling right?  We've all been there and it ALWAYS happens at the worst possible time.  What matters though, really, is the recovery. I hate that you had to leave so abruptly though, as you missed the part where he washed his hands before preparing the drink you ordered. It was good too. I know because I drank it. We love you either way. Even when we don't meet your expectations. We will put your feedback to good use and make it a learning experience.  It is our mission to look to the past and improve the future!!

name: Scot McKinney
text: Super customer service, great coffee, awesome selection of records and comics. A great place to shop and hangout, plus the patio is sweet!

name: N Flippo
text: If the city of Florence was a store, this would be it... Great coffee and drinks (try the coffee milkshake), a varied collection of comics as well they are willing to order for you if they don't have something, and vinyl records from vintage to new. Definitely stop by to grab a drink and browse or sit on the back patio!

resp.text: Word is bond

name: Will Mitchell (Captain Will)
text: I may visit others, but this is MY comic shop.  It's a small place because they've just got started, but the folks are great, and so is the coffee.  There's lots of vinyl records, if you're into that sort of thing.  My wife and I stop in at least once a week, and they're making comic collectors out of the both of us!

name: Tiffany Kilburn
text: Absolutely amazing caramel macchiato, (not overly sweet like Starbucks) Patrick was very friendly and informative. Lovely Patio to just chill while enjoying your coffee. Will definitely be a added delight to my normal routine.

resp.text: We appreciate your kind words Tiffany!

name: Toni Serpa
text: Not a lot of anything it states in its name, but more than you'll find anywhere else around for hours. Record selection is minimal, comic selection is mostly newer items, and coffee wasn't half bad!

resp.text: Love It!!! Not half bad.

name: Ashley Harris
text: Great coffee with lots of flavor! Nice to see another local coffee shop. Plus there's plenty to look at, books and board games for hanging out, and you can do your music/comic shopping all in one stop!

name: Chicknwings
text: I've been coming here for over a month now, and absolutely love the environment and variety they offer.

resp.text: Thank you Chicknwings. We work hard to provide a unique environment and experience. Also, we really love chicken wings. So by default, we really love you!

name: Spencer Lane
text: Love this little shop. Staff are always welcoming and talkative. Vinyls, comic books, and coffee. Nothing bad about it.

name: Penny Queen
text: Good music, nice people, very quiet and peaceful.

resp.text: The BEST music! We try as much as we can to specialize in local, regional, and projects tied to the Shoals area. Also harder to find, exclusive, limited edition records, along with lots of under the radar stuff.  Thanks for your support!

name: Todd Beene
text: Fantastic locally owned comic, music, and coffee spot. The backyard is a crucial hang. Get some coffee, buy something, and spend some time out back for a great day.

name: ubermonkeyking
text: This is the best comic shop we have in this area. Guys are great and love their smoothies.

name: Andrew Lewis
text: Great selection of coffee, comics, and music including vinyl.  Nice patio to relax at.  Support your local record store!

name: Max Tew
text: Great coffee, great music, great staff. If you're looking for a place to work quietly, to talk to a stranger, or to just sit in a cozy room and enjoy a nice cup of coffee, this is the place.

name: Philip Gambrell
text: They have an amazing selection of records, books, tapes, comics, and CDs. Their coffee and smoothies are amazing, and the people are amazingly nice.

resp.text: Thank you, again and again.

name: QuaLude Cage
text: As always Great time with some awesome comics and sweet surrounding

name: Ray Martinez
text: Good comics selection. Fair prices. Nice clean store.

name: Callie White
text: Friendly employees, all very knowledgeable about music and comics. This is where I always go for new music and comic book releases.

name: Tim Elam
text: Great place to grab a cup of coffee and shop for a new comic book or vinyl record. Nice selection of books, music, and accessories.

name: June Howard Barr
text: Such a neat place. Coffee is probably my favorite in florence. The staff is so nice and the selection of records is great!

name: Steve Patterson
text: Super place to enjoy a great cup of coffee and shop for vantage records, t shirts and comic books.

name: Beautiful Noise Vinyl And Gaming Clips
text: This place is great and the owner is very friendly and knowledgeable about his products if you're in the Florence area this is your go to stop for harder to find records especially if you're into indie music

name: Michael Smith
text: Love it!

name: Jared Wallin
text: Cool little comic shop / record store / coffee bar all in one.

name: Pokeypuppy 105
text: Cleanliness and service isn't the best, but it is a neat experience for someone into comics

resp.text: Ouch. We've maintained a 99% Health Rating since day one.  Both owners have over 30 years combined in service industry management.  I'm curious if you ever gave us an opportunity to resolve your service issue before sharing it with the world?  Things happen and when they do we ALWAYS go above and beyond to make it right. Thank you for your feedback. We will continue to do our best!

name: Will Burhans
text: Nice store, great variety of drinks. Nice atmosphere.

name: Yolande Webster (Kabiu)
text: Nice comic book store.  Lots of selection.

resp.text: Thanks so much Yolande.  As a growth opportunity, how could we have earned that extra 🌟?

name: Jason Sassin
text: Great store with great owner and employees. Always a pleasure.

name: Brian Dunaway
text: Really cool place. Great selection and great staff.

name: John Tipler
text: I think they stopped carrying comics. Maybe they were going out of business? 🤔 Maybe.

name: Jeremy Woods
text: Great coffee. Great record selection. Great vibe.

name: Leslie Brown
text: Quaint local place! Vinyl and comic book junkies should totally check it out!

name: Lisa Evans The Fam
text: Great atmosphere , and very polite and respectful people working here.

resp.text: Lisa, we appreciate your kind words and value your business!!  For exclusive deals available only to regular customers, sign up for our newsletters through the "contact" page of our website @ www.blankcoffeecomicsrecords.com

name: Scott Norris
text: Perfect service and fun atmosphere

resp.text: That's the goal, at least. Must've caught us on a good day.

name: Joseph Brown
text: A cool little place to get your music and coffee

name: DC Roman
text: Coffe is pricey, but its good.

resp.text: We're glad you enjoyed the coffee. We try hard to keep our prices competitive, as they are the same, or lower, than the other local options. Unfortunately, artisan coffees are just plain expensive.  Next time ask about our loyalty program, where every 7th drink is free. Thank you for stopping in.

name: Pruitt Holcombe
text: Good coffee, good smoothies, great comics and great staff!

name: Kim Santos
text: Excellent Coffee. Relaxed atmosphere.

resp.text: Thank you for your business!

name: Cody H
text: Really awesome place with great vibes.

name: Jeremy Cravens
text: Love this place!

name: gamerguyAJ
text: Very cool place

name: Brian Schweighardt
text: Great place for vinyl comics and coffee.

resp.text: We appreciate your business!

name: Dylan Hodges
text: The people there were so nice

resp.text: Glad to know we're keeping it together, at least during hours of operation. We are a mess IRL.

name: C M Hughes
text: Great little comic book store

resp.text: Who you calling little?!?! But seriously; little store, big heart, and mediocre work ethic.

name: Cody Haithcock
text: Great place will be there again

name: Dustin Coan
text: Great little comic book and record store!

name: Hunter Parrish
text: Great shop, owners are super nice

resp.text: We think you're super nice too! Thanks.

name: Joey Turnage
text: Great shop with great people!

resp.text: Thank you, but as people we are seriously flawed. Every day we remain open is a miracle because those popular stereotypes about comic nerds and music snobs couldn't be more true. What we do have, however, are great customers.

name: Mary Cook
text: Very trendy, cute shop, great selection of comics

name: Brian Cameron
text: Good comic and record collection.

resp.text: Brian, thanks for the props! Better to respond late than never, right? We add dozens of rare and highly collectible records every week. For exclusive dscounts through our customer newsletter, contact us at www.blankccr.com

name: Kyle Jackson
text: K I yuug

name: mike wallace
text: Comic books, used albums, coffee and live music. what more could you want

name: Rachael Gardner
text: I've lived near Decature most of my life and I didn't know we had a second hand book shop the owner is wonderful they can order you anything you want if they don't have it in store. They were able to order me a book with specific art on the cover for a wonderful price. I so with I would have found this place sooner I've spent so much money on new books when I could have gone here.

resp.text:
Thanks so much for your kind words. We are happy to help you anytime. Enjoy your weekend and Happy Reading.
Melinda

name: katharyn anderson
text: Very well organized- beautiful Christian music being played

resp.text: Thank you so much for all the nice comments. Happy Reading!

name: andrea schwenk
text: Great pricing, variety, and customer service. Will come back soon!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words. We hope to see you back soon and Happy Reading. Thanks Melinda

name: Jack LaFountain
text: Great shop with a very nice selection of books. My favorite local store.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the nice review. We look forward to the day we can have a face to face book signing with you. Thanks Melinda

name: Sarah Klimko
text: Just found this adorable little gem of a store. They have an array of nice, hardback and paperback books. They also have nice displays, and there is a homey quality to the store. Good prices, too!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words. We hope you enjoy all your reads. Stop in and see a again.

name: Dede Quarry
text: Cat stalkers unite!  This literary feline (Callie), with all her prose and cons, has all the hallmarks of a book store cat.  A wonderful selection of books and a wealth of knowledge from the owner and bibliophile, Melinda!  I would highly recommended a stop in to see Callie and Melinda at Second Read Books!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind words.

name: Tammy Massie
text:
This locally owned bookstore is really cute.  I finished my book on my flight from DC to Alabama and needed to find something for the return flight. It was just the right size with lots of books displayed in a variety of themes.

The bookstore kitty was icing on the cake

resp.text: Thanks for all your kind words and safe travels back home.

name: Kayla Lowery-Busick
text: They have a great selection of fantasy/sci-fi as well as general fiction. She also has a great selection of history and non-fiction books. She has tons of books by local authors and lots of books about local events and culture. I really like this book store, and there's a coffee shop across the street!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your sweet comments. Happy Reading

name: dtruitt70
text: Friendly and knowledgeable staff!  Great book store!  They also have a pet cat. 🐈

resp.text: Thanks so much for your support and kind words. Happy Reading

name: Mystique Harrison
text: Very cute small used bookstore. Melinda, the owner, is very knowledgeable and always has a good recommendation. I never feel pressured or rushed here. If you like books you must check out this gem!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind words. Happy a Reading and can’t wait to see you again soon.

name: Kelli Lovelace
text: If you love to read yo must check this store out. Even if you only read at the beach or at the pool you must go enjoy this great little store! The prices are great and the selection is amazing. Wonderful store and wonderful staff!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for all your kind words. We hope you enjoy all your books.

name: Jessica Letson
text: I love Second Read Books! They have great prices and a lot of variety, despite the size of the store. It is set up in an extremely convenient manner, and the prices are more than fair!! I have gotten about 15 practically new Stephen King books for less than $40! The owners are some of the sweetest book-loving people I know. If you love used books, then you NEED to drop by!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review!

name: Aprille Flemons
text: Excellent customer service, friendly staff, and a lovely, cozy book store! I love this place!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind words.

name: Zack Franklin
text:
This place is awesome! The owner is very nice and helpful. They have lots of great books at a really good price. They're also very fair/gracious with your trade in value of old books. The store is in a very cool location too.
Historic Downtown Decatur shopping district with lots of great places to eat. I love it!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the nice review. We look forward to you returning to Second Read Books.

name: Dana Jolley Ramirez
text: This is my favorite bookstore! They have a great selection, great prices, and the store is so cute! Also, the owner is so helpful and nice. Everyone definitely needs to check this place out. You will love it!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the nice comments. We hope you enjoy your books.

name: Patrick Rist
text: Small vanity shop. Best stock goes online. Nice lady running it, but it's really just a front for the stuff they can't sell profitably online.

name: Jacob Taylor
text: Owner was extremely helpful with a gift I got for a friend. I told her I needed to ship it, and she went to the back, got wrapping materials and packed them up for me with no extra charge. She was very nice and friendly.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words!  Please visit us again.

name: Inked Koffee King
text: Very wonderful and friendly. So many titles and amazing prices! Definitely going to be a place I visit whenever I'm in town.

resp.text: Thank you for the nice review!  We look forward to seeing you again!

name: paul marques
text: This book store is owned by wonderfully joyful people to be around who seem genuinely happy to see their customers.  The store is neat and welcoming.  Coffee is often available but is not sold there.  The book shelves are full with a wide assortment of books which I'll bet most readers could find something of interest in.  The proprietors do their research and seek out books of quality which are fun to hold and buy.  To me the prices are more than fair.  At the present time after lots of book store looking, this store holds the top place.  My wife agrees with everything I have written.  She loves it.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words!  It has been our pleasure to serve customers like you and your wife!

name: Donna Schrimsher
text: I LOVE THIS STORE!

resp.text: Thanks so much for you kind words. Happy Reading!

name: Jeannabeanna Stephens
text: Great books. Came for a book signing. Very cozy.

resp.text: Thank you!  Please visit us again!

name: melissa hand
text: I love this local independent bookstore in downtown Decatur! Books are perfectly priced & the selection is great. I will definitely be back to buy more books!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the nice review! We look forward to being your new favorite book stop!

name: Jennifer Busick
text: Great selection, great prices, great events, plus Callie the bookstore cat. What's not to like?

resp.text: Thanks so much for the wonderful comments about our store. We look forward to your next visit at Second Read Books.

name: Anna Mac
text: A great quaint bookstore! Fun to pop in and see what books they have.

resp.text: Thanks so much. We love for you to stop in.

name: Marilyn Sykes
text:
Great selection of used books.
Wonderful place!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review!

name: Rob Simpson
text: Nice place, good selection. Great price on HB books. Owner is super nice too!

resp.text: Thanks so much. Hope to see you soon back in the store.

name: Jennifer Puckett
text: Great store...and they have a little cat too.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind words. We hope you enjoy all your books.

name: Merri Bass
text: Athens needs a Second Read Books!

resp.text: Maybe one day!

name: Staci Hill
text: Neat little book nook...

resp.text: Thanks so much for your review and kind words. Happy Reading and Happy 2020

name: Jo-Amrah Dillingham
text: Great store! Looking forward to the new bookclub!

resp.text: Thank you!  We are excited also about the new book club!

name: Janet Helgemo
text: Great used bookstore in Priceville Al. Not huge but has a really good variety

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!  Please stop in again!

name: Laura Bullard
text: Love it!!! Great store, great prices, great people!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for all of your kind words. We hope you enjoy your books.

name: Jon Bates
text: Great place with great deals.

resp.text: Thank you for the review!  Please visit again!

name: Becky Tipton
text: Great finds and large selection

resp.text: Thanks so much. Hope you are enjoying the books you got.

name: LaShawn Peterson
text:
I had a good day at the library book store!
And the volunteers were as friendly and helpful as they could be!

name: Elizabeth Shelby
text: This is the best..lots of books and very reasonable. The staff are very friendly and helpful when searching for a certain author.

name: Lashunda Dunn
text: The public library is cool with nice, very helpful and patient staff.

name: Bette Parker
text: Huge selection of books and media items.  Reasonable prices.  Cash or check with drivers license only.  They don't accept plastic.   They only allow a few in at a time and follow all Covid related protocol.

name: Lynn Blackwell
text: It would have been nice if they updated their website. My grandsons(11 & 6) are visiting and love to read. We were very disappointed it wasn't open. There aren't any other places to buy used books in Tuscaloosa anymore.

name: Mike Woddail
text: A great  joy, resulting  from  our  taxes.

name: Dan Clark
text: Bought great books on photography and some albums for @ $2 each

name: David Chumney
text: Very helpful volunteers. When enough people came to shop, one of the volunteers stepped outside to let someone else go in. Following good social distancing practices and making sure that donated books are sterilized before being placed on the shelf.

name: Bobby Hustead
text: never crowded,always clean,and quiet

name: Martha Wyatt
text: Helpful. Friendly. Good selection

name: Mary Mann
text: It was clean peaceful and the people were understandable and nice

name: Sarah Rushing
text: A wonderful used book store. Great collection and fantastic prices (I caught they during a week in which everything was 1/2 off). They had lots of books that suited my interests (music, adventure, non-fiction). Very impressed.

name: Edward Pugh Jr
text: Well prepared to help in the possible transfer of The CV.

name: Sunita Bothara
text: They have pretty good prices for the books. Good place to find some books. Hope they will have more collection.

name: Sarah Cross
text: Small, well-organized, worth your time to check it out! Reasonable prices.

name: Teresa Atchenson
text: Love the people there,quiet place

name: Antoinette Collinson
text: Good

name: Dtd D
text: Lots of great books priced $2-$3. Kids books are $.25.

name: Greg Baxley
text: Lots of cheap treasures.

name: Erich Wildgrube
text: The best place in Alabama for used books!

name: Michael Edwards
text: Love it

name: SoGrateful Journey
text: Educational variety of books, tapes, etc

name: William Hill
text: Helpful advice and people

name: mary taylor
text: Staff friendly

name: Krystal Littrell
text: Great used book store!! If they don’t have it, they go above and beyond to find it for you!! Great prices as well!!! Definitely will be returning when I am able to write down all the books I’m looking for!!

name: Cassandra Daffin
text: Very nice and helpful staff! Excellent prices.

name: Richard Fisher
text: If you have the time I'm sure you can find the book you are looking for here. It is one of those bookstores that you have to dig a little to find that gem on the shelf. The owner is such a sweet lady. I pestered her at closing time but she put up with me with good grace. Well recommended.

name: Jeff Day
text: Great place for used books. Great prices and service. If you read books you should stop by.

name: Anna Deakle
text: We love Ms. Meg! She is one of the nicest people out there! Best prices on books and great customer service.

name: Kevin Todd
text: Very humble building but the knowledge of owners is immense. They are so willing to help and share their love of books

name: Elizabeth Dockens
text: Such a huge variety of items. So much, in fact, that I didn't have a chance to go through everything. The prices were cheap and the staff was extremely friendly. Will definitely recommend and will be going back there again soon myself.

name: Joshua Albritton
text: Awesome small business bookstore. Floor to ceiling books all around and all super cheap. I once walked out with a dozen books for $36. Lots of classics. The owner is the nicest lady and will help you find exactly what you need. She also says she accepts book donations for store credit. Bibliophiles should definitely check this place out!

name: LESTINE ROBINSON
text: DD, the owner, was great! She had just what my daughter needed for school. Very neat store. Will return soon. Go check out Meg's books!

name: Jacq Lerose
text: This is no longer 'Meg's Books', it  is now 'Open Doors Thrift' on Moffett. Great selection, more than fair prices & Mr Charles & his lovely wife are most knowledgeable.  Dont ever drive past headed to walmart to purchase obscure items w/o going inside, they will most likely have needed item for 25% of walmart price!

name: John Dunn
text: Huge selection, fair prices , very  welcoming and knowledgable owner.

name: JOKER Morris
text: If you are looking for a certain Author she can get it for you, or point you in the right direction.

name: Irish Eyes
text: Great place to buy any gently used book that you may be looking for. HUGE selections of each type of book you may enjoy reading.

name: Marie Hansen (Mrs. Hansen)
text: Megs book store is an amazing place to get books. Friendly and great prices!

name: Justin Hughey
text:
Kind of out in the middle of nowhere, but it makes up for it with the selection it has. It's one of the only places around here that I can find a lot of Asimov books that aren't the usual I, Robot or Foundation series. Nice ownership and very helpful.

The only downside is that it's a bit claustrophobic at times, but if you're a bibliophile, then it won't matter.

Either way, check it out.

name: Richard Johnston
text: I stopped in and marveled at the selection, which is pretty extensive. The employee was particularly helpful, and seemed quite knowledgeable. I'll definitely go back there.

name: Jason Brazeal (BitterElasticat)
text: The proprietor of the store is friendly and helpful. She will help you find what you are trying to find.

name: aquatic engineer
text: It has very nice customer service. The layout of the store felt like something from Inkheart.😀

name: Ben Stith
text: A lot of stuff, very friendly, but not catalogued. Great for browsing!

name: Paul East
text: Wonderful used bookstore. Meg is great. Wish it were not so far away. Not open everyday.

name: Nathan Grant
text: Great selection at wonderful prices. Locally owned, and friendly owners!

name: Shirlee Young
text: Great customer service great selection of books

name: Devan G
text:
Lotsa books :D

Meg was super nice and informative. My a wife is a huge reader and the store was like heaven for her.

name: Ken Austin
text: Great selection, reasonable prices, and awesome service.

name: donna johnston
text: She is helpful, prices are great and inventory is unbelievable.

name: Julie Younger
text: She will help you find what you need

name: Shannon Martin
text: We found books at Megs that noone else had without ordering. Great prices.

name: Carrie Booker
text: Great books.  Lovely owner.

name: Carrie Booker
text: Great books.  Lovely owner.

name: Stormi Paulk
text: Great books at great prices

name: Jessica
text: Great selection!

name: Sarah b Fowler
text: I was with someone there .

name: Karl Pajak
text: Wonderful and fun!

name: Katie Champion
text:
(Translated by Google) Love Meg's!

(Original)
Love Meg's!
